column6: The all-new next chapter in the award-winning POWERS continues. As Deena uncovers her father's past sins, Walker finds himself the personal target of the new Powers serial killer. All this and another exclusive behind-the-scenes look at the Sony POWERS TV show, which will be on the air at the same time that this book ships!
column8: | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | penciller (cover):Mike Avon Oeming
